module.name: leguide
module.description: LeGuide.com Group, the network of shopping guides, price comparison sites, shopping search engines and online consumer forums, is the domain leader in France and number 2 across Europe, with 12
module.description_full: LeGuide.com Group, the network of shopping guides, price comparison sites, shopping search engines and online consumer forums, is the domain leader in France and number 2 across Europe, with 12.8 million unique visitors. The company is a trusted intermediary between users and shop sites, and helps shoppers with every stage of their online purchases, helping them to hit that shopping high through scores of special offers. LeGuide.com Group is present in 14 countries and lists over 60.000 online shops and 135 million products. (*Comscore April 2010) Features Leguide.com The module will allow you to : - synchronize your entire shop to LeGuide.com automatically taking into account the specific scheduling LeGuide.com This will give you the opportunity to develop your business and showcase your site your best deals. Find all the modules for PrestaShop comparators in category comparateurs de prix PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: seohelping
module.description: Increase your SEO and your visibility in search engines such as Google thanks to the module SEO (Search Engine Optimization) developed by PrestaShop!
module.description_full: Increase your SEO and your visibility in search engines such as Google thanks to the module SEO (Search Engine Optimization) developed by PrestaShop!
module.additional_description: This module allows you to optimize your SEO in a few clicks. Very easy to use, this module will fill automatically all the essential Meta tags for a good search engine optimization, whatever the number of your products. You will have unique tags for each of your pages and keywords that fit exactly your products. The visibility is a key success factor for an online store. Many studies revealed that approximately 85% of the Internet users do not go beyond the first result page. This proves that without a good SEO, nobody will find your products. Reach your objectives with this worthy module! Essential for any good merchant!﻿﻿

module.displayName: Google Merchant Center: the best Google Shopping module
module.description: Upload your products to Google Shopping and get thousands of new, highly qualified visitors on your online shop
module.description_full: Upload your products to Google Shopping and get thousands of new, highly qualified visitors on your online shop.
module.additional_description: Also discover our Google Rich Snippets + Product Ratings and Reviews module on http://addons.prestashop.com/en/seo-prestashop-modules/6144-google-rich-snippets-product-ratings-and-reviews.html and Google Remarketing + Dynamic on http://addons.prestashop.com/en/advertising-marketing-newsletter-modules/9736-google-remarketing-dynamic.html The position of your products in these results depends largely on the quality of your feed and completeness of your data. The more information you include, the better the results ! This module will let you achieve just that and maximize your chances of obtaining good rankings on Google Shopping, while minimizing the time you will need to spend to have all your products accepted by Google. module.description: Propose a practical service to your customers: the gift certificates! More and more spread and popular, the gift certificates complete your range of products and delight the most indecisive customers
module.description_full: Propose a practical service to your customers: the gift certificates! More and more spread and popular, the gift certificates complete your range of products and delight the most indecisive customers in the choice of presents.
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: pm_advancedsearch4
module.description: Best Module Award Winner - Add the fastest layered navigation system for PrestaShop !
module.description_full: Best Module Award Winner - Add the fastest layered navigation system for PrestaShop !
module.additional_description: Provide to your customers the products that meet their needs. Indispensable tool for shops offering a wide selection of products, Advanced Search 4 can add as many search engines as you want and place them in different places on your website. This module was developed in an effort to provide short loading times, even on large catalogs. Your visitors can browse products that match their search criteria, to make their purchases in minimal time. Winner of the Best PrestaShop Modules Awards 2012 Advanced Search 4 won the Best module of the year Award at the PrestaShop BarCamp of Barcelona (Spain)! Indispensable tool for shops offering a wide selection of products. Advanced Search 4 adds the multi-layered navigation, search by step, filters and multi-criteria searches. Each search is saved over the navigation, allowing your visitors to return to the results of their research at any time. Google is his friend This PrestaShop Addon is a small revolution for SEO. Advanced Search 4 generate a mass-produced products pages optimized for SEO, and without duplicate content! Pick up your criteria on which you want to improve your SEO, validate them, and here you go with hundreds of pages listing your products, including: re-written URL, H1 tags, description, meta tags, automatised cross links... To maximize your reputation, these results pages can be shared on most social networks places around the internet, as well as sent by e-mail.
module.author: Presta-Module

module.name: printlabels
module.description: Save valuable time by automating the publishing of your shipping labels! This module for PrestaShop lets you edit and print shipping labels to stick on your package, based on orders placed on your si
module.description_full: Save valuable time by automating the publishing of your shipping labels! This module for PrestaShop lets you edit and print shipping labels to stick on your package, based on orders placed on your site. You can choose to print one or three labels on a single page to suit your needs!
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: cartabandonment
module.description: An abandoned cart no longer means a lost sale! Remind your clients that they left items in their shopping cart with automatic personalized emails
module.description_full: An abandoned cart no longer means a lost sale! Remind your clients that they left items in their shopping cart with automatic personalized emails.﻿
module.additional_description: Each time a customer creates a shopping cart but does not make the final purchase, an email is automatically sent to remind and encourage them to complete their order. The benefits are numerous and it’s easy to use! Send one or more automatic personalized emails to your customers to remind them of the contents of their cart to turn an abandoned cart into a sale Utilize coupons and discounts to encourage customers to complete their order Easily create email templates tailored to your online store Track the conversion rate of your various emails through detailed statistics that you can follow in your back office. See what your customers best respond to! Default email text is available in English and French to guide you in creating your templates. Simply customize them to your liking!﻿
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: privatesale
module.description: This addon is compatible with Prestashop v1
module.description_full: This addon is compatible with Prestashop v1.6 ! Create easily private sales with the items you want to destock on your ecommerce site with this PrestaShop module!
module.additional_description: Private sales allow you to: give a privileged status to the customers you are inviting (VIP) sell your stock on the products of your choice establish customer loyalty attract new customers with this popular selling model The module Private Sales PrestaShop is very easy to use. In back office, you only have to set: The name of the private sale its description The category to which it relates (feel free to create specific categories if you want to make a private sale of a late collection of articles of the same brand, etc.). The group to which the private sale is open (registered visitors, customers, VIP ...) The date and time the private sale starts and ends The image you want to assign to this private sale

module.additional_description: This module lets you know exactly what is happening on your shop. Now you are able to visualize the path of a visitor, his reactions on each page visited, ease or blocking steps in the ordering process ...

module.name: mynewsletter
module.description: There’s no better way to keep in touch with customers and up your conversion rates and increase customer loyalty, than with this Newsletter and Statistics module! This brilliant module makes it easy
module.description_full: There’s no better way to keep in touch with customers and up your conversion rates and increase customer loyalty, than with this Newsletter and Statistics module! This brilliant module makes it easy to send your customers gorgeous newsletters that keeps them coming back to shop! You can count on this module to do all the hard work for you!
module.additional_description: Track your stats: Every detail about your newsletter is available for you to review. This allows merchants to monitor what is and isn't a working to improve future newsletters over time. Additional benefits include: Personalized Newsletter Build customer loyalty Build your brand Stay in touch with your customers Provide a medium to inform customers about sales, announcements, new inventory, etc.
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: pm_seointernallinking
module.description: Improve your SEO through internal linking strategy
module.description_full: Improve your SEO through internal linking strategy
module.additional_description: Enhance your PrestaShop SEO Internal linking is the creation of links between pages of your shop, using keywords you want to achieve a better place on Google. To optimize the SEO of your website, it is essential to create an internal linking that will allow search engines to browse your shop in the most easy way as possible. The goal is to provide maximum informations with the least clicks deep. SEO Internal Linking PrestaShop module optimizes the organization of navigation in your store, and plays an essential role in your SEO strategy. Define the keywords on which you wish to be listed and their landing pages, and let the module create the links for you! If you want to add automatic links in your categories descriptions, consider installing our PrestaShop module HTML On Descriptions. Do we really need internal linking? Internal linking strategy based on specific keywords is an optimization method that has proven its worth. Especially to enhance a content relevance. Among the disadvantages, you should know that the installation of these links is long and tedious, and requires to follow SEO good practices, to not over-optimize (which would be detected by Google), and must be updated regularly to track changes in your catalog. With this in mind, we have developed this module, allowing you to deploy thousands of cross links between your pages within minutes, while being sure to observe best practice guidelines of White Hat SEO. It has been designed to support both SEO agencies and e-shop owners. SEO Internal Linking is really simple to manage.
module.author: Presta-Module

module.name: ordertaxprofitreport
module.displayName: Advanced sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports
module.description: Create professional sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports in HTML format or export as a CSV / Excel file
module.description_full: Create professional sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports in HTML format or export as a CSV / Excel file.
module.additional_description: Get perfect visibility on your shop's and products' profitability ! The default PrestaShop installation does not provide a one-click tool that allows you to obtain important accounting and financial data: tax due, net sales volume after discounts and, most importantly, profit and profit margin. Not only will this report provide you with all this data, but it will even allow you to answer questions like "what percentage of total sales and / or profits does this specific brand, supplier or product category represent ?". This stylish and pleasant AJAX based module allows you to generate different types of preformed reports with all this information. They can be viewed on screen in HTML format or exported as a CSV file to manipulate in Excel and / or import into any other information or accounting system. This module is developed and published by Business Tech, certified PrestaShop developer and winner of the 2011 PrestaShop Awards for Best module. You are guaranteed to buy a quality module and to get fast and efficient tech support in case you need it.
module.author: Business Tech
module.url: http://addons.prestashop.com/en/analytics-stats-prestashop-modules/5255-advanced-sales-tax-profit-and-profit-margin-reports.html?utm_source=v1trunk_api&utm_content=advanced sales, tax, profit and profit margin reports

module.name: orderpreparation
module.description: Save time in preparing your order through this module! With one click, this module allows you to extract the commands in the pipeline, and sort by location or product
module.description_full: Save time in preparing your order through this module! With one click, this module allows you to extract the commands in the pipeline, and sort by location or product. You just have to take the corresponding quantities at each location. Prepare faster your orders!
module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: pm_multiplefeatures
module.displayName: Multiple Features - Assign your features as you want
module.description: Multiple Features allows you to assign multiple values ​​of features to your products
module.description_full: Multiple Features allows you to assign multiple values ​​of features to your products
module.additional_description: Add features to your PrestaShop catalog without limits! With Multiple Features, you can assign as many values as necessary for the same product and the same feature. Remove this PrestaShop limitation and start using your features as you want! If you also use our layered navigation system Advanced Search 4 (Winner of PrestaShop Best Module Awards 2012), you can give to your customers a more relevant research in your catalog. Customer study : Ocarat.com: "Some jewelry may have a different composition and an alloy of several metals. PrestaShop provides the ability to associate a feature to a product. However, I want to integrate in my shop a gold ring set with diamonds and emeralds. But features tab does not allow me to do so. I can't assign multiple values to a single purpose. So I have to choose between gold, diamonds or emeralds. Multiple Features remove PrestaShop limits and allows you to use features as you want !"
module.author: Presta-Module
module.url: http://addons.prestashop.com/en/search-filters-prestashop-modules/6356-multiple-features-assign-your-features-as-you-want.html?utm_source=v1trunk_api&utm_content=multiple features - assign your features as you want
